remarks: Ordering property of ordinal exponentiation.  Corollary 8.34 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 68 and its converse.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jan-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-May-2015.)
statement: oeord $p |- ( ( A e. On /\ B e. On /\ C e. ( On \ 2o ) ) -> ( A e. B <-> ( C ^o A ) e. ( C ^o B ) ) ) $.
